mapper.select: select p.id, p.item_code, p.item_name, p.files_code, p.form_code, p.form_name, p.post_status, org_member.NAME as proposer, org_unit.NAME as dept from Purchase_primary p left join org_member on org_member.ID = p.proposer left join org_unit on org_member.ORG_DEPARTMENT_ID = org_unit.ID where org_member.NAME = #{name} order by p.files_code desc

select top ${limit} d.* from (SELECT c.*, row_number() over (ORDER BY id ASC) as rownumber FROM (select p.id, p.item_code, p.item_name, p.files_code, p.form_code, p.form_name, p.post_status, org_member.NAME as proposer, org_unit.NAME as dept from Purchase_primary p left join org_member on org_member.ID = p.proposer left join org_unit on org_member.ORG_DEPARTMENT_ID = org_unit.ID where org_member.NAME = #{name}) as c) as d WHERE rownumber > ((${limit} * ${page}) - ${limit}) order by d.files_code desc
select top ${limit} d.* from (SELECT c.*, row_number() over (ORDER BY field0001 ASC) as rownumber FROM ( select * from formmain_0030) as c) as d WHERE rownumber > ((${limit} * ${page}) - ${limit})
mapper.insert: insert into Tabulation_listing(field0001, field0002, open_date, close_date, sublist_id) values (#{field0001}, #{field0002}, #{open_date}, #{close_date}, #{sublist_id})
mapper.select: select * from formmain_0030 where field0002 like '%' + #{field0002} + '%'
select p.*, t.* from Purchase_primary p left join Purchase_sublist s on p.id = s.relation_id left join Tabulation_listing t on t.sublist_id = s.id where s.id = #{id}
SELECT p.id, p.item_code, p.item_name, p.files_code, p.form_code, p.form_name, p.post_status FROM Purchase_primary p WHERE p.post_status != 2

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Purchase_sublist WHERE relation_id = #{id} AND enable_status = '正常') - (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Purchase_sublist WHERE post_status = 2 AND relation_id = #{id} AND enable_status = '正常')
